
```{r}
#'load libs
source("libs.R")
library(readr)
```

```{r}
#'load data
waterlevel = read_delim("knots_data/waterdata-HAR_WTER_VLIE-201706010000_201711012359.txt", delim = ";", skip = 3) %>% filter(datum %between% c("2017-09-01", "2017-10-31"))
waterlevel = waterlevel %>% mutate(time = as.POSIXct(paste(datum,tijd,sep = " "), format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"))

waterlevel.k2 = waterlevel %>% filter(time %between% c("2017-09-15","2017-09-20"))
```

```{r}
#'load function for high and low tide
source("knots_data_functions/high_low_tide.R")
```

```{r}
#'pass data to function
tide = HL(level = waterlevel.k2$waarde, time = waterlevel.k2$time, period =13)
```

```{r}
#'save data
save(tide, file = "k2.tides.rdata")
```
